price: Do not grieve over them, nor be distressed by their plots.
arabic: وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا تَكُن فِي ضَيۡقٖ مِّمَّا يَمۡكُرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
